item.title: How to automatically maintain a MySQL Tableâ€™s Partitions?
item.description: A lot of data in applications is time-stamped and is it is sequenced in that manner. Only the data of a defined time range will be really required in the active working of the application and the rest will just be historical data available for downloads, reports etc. A great example of this can be order history of a user. Only the past 1 month order data may be relevant and available for the user to perform some actions.
